name: kiro-automation
description: Comprehensive automation toolkit for Kiro IDE - autonomous task execution and VS Code extension

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd executor && npm install && cd ../extension && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:executor && npm run build:extension
scripts.test: npm run test:executor && npm run test:extension
scripts.clean: npm run clean:executor && npm run clean:extension
scripts.clean:executor: cd executor && rm -rf node_modules execution-state.json execution.log
scripts.docs: echo 'Documentation available in README.md and docs/ directory'
